'''Orm''' was a sea-captain of the [[Forodwaith]] of [[Ponórir|i·Ponōrir]] in an earlier version of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]] according to ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=history>{{LT2|VIb}}, p. 318</ref>

==History==
Orm led a group of Forodwaith in the siege of [[Kortirion]], a city located in [[Leithian]]. During an assault, he killed the father of [[Ælfwine]], [[Déor (father of Ælfwine)|Déor]], who was leading a "desperate sally" defending the city.<ref name=history/>
